title: Math Service Access Design in Web-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage and understanding of elementary mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Learners participate in math learning activities via smartphone in non-PC environments, using an LMS integrated with ReST-based web services.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize web-based math tools (calculators, graph generators, etc.) accessible via ReST API with 80% accuracy.
Learners can create and share organized math concept notes using embedded wiki services within an LMS.
Learners can explain the procedure for accessing URL-based learning services in mobile environments within three steps.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
